game.name: Regular Human Workshop
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 창작마당, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Regular Human Workshop is a 2D physics simulation sandbox. There are no predefined goals or objectives. Simply throw objects into the world and interact with them in various ways.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Regular Human Workshop is a 2D physics simulation sandbox. There are no predefined goals or objectives. Simply throw objects into the world and interact with them in various ways.

reviewHighlights.text: 솔직히 같은 가격이면 people play ground가 훨씬 낫다 ㄹㅇ
